selected_quotes: Children's oral health-related quality of life,associated factors:Changes after dental work under general anesthesia

citation.abstract: This study aimed to document the mid-term effects of comprehensive dental treatment under general anesthesia (DTGA) on parent-assessed children's oral health-related quality of life (COHRQoL). A second aim was to examine some epidemiological factors associated with COHRQoL and treatment outcome.
citation.title: Children's oral health-related quality of life and associated factors: Mid-term changes after dental treatment under general anesthesia.

author.name: Pediatric Anesthesia
author.description: All things Pediatric Anesthesia! Get the latest news, research, clinical pearls from leaders/experts/peers. By Dr Clyde Matava MD @innov8doc #PedsAnes
